name: Republique Extras
detailed_description:
This purchase includes:

  • Soundtrack: The original soundtrack to all five episodes. (Episode 1-3 soundtracks available now; Episode 4 and 5 soundtracks coming soon)
  • The Making of Republique*: A six-part series (numbered 0-5) chronicling Republique's genesis and the making of each episode as it happens. Features over an hour of behind the scenes content, interviews with team members, and more. (Part 0-3 available now; Part 4 & 5 coming soon)
  • Exclusive prototypes*: Witness the evolution of Republique by playing through two prototypes: "Human Condition" (2012) and Republique's "Vertical Slice" (2013).

*item and/or documentation is available in English only
